|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Samsung;KLM8G2FEJA-A001; |flash1size = 8 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = Samsung;K4B2G0846D-HCK0; |ram1_num = 4 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->

}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Specifications=== *CPU: [[Marvell]] 88DE3100 ([[Synaptics]] BG2) @1.2 GHz :Dual Core ARM Cortex-A7 (Armada 1500) :*GPU: Vivante GC3000 @750MHz *Video Processor: [[Marvell]] [https://www.marvell.com/guide/product/?type=Video%20Processors%20And%20Hybrid%20Demodulator&p=88DE2755 88DE2755] *WLAN: [[Foxconn J20H045]] ([[Marvell]])
